parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the common parameter. The description must be 1 to 200 characters in length.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the common parameter. The name must be 1 to 200 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). It cannot start with ALIYUN, ACS, ALIBABA, ALICLOUD, or OOS.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be added to common parameter.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: The value of the common parameter. The value must be 1 to 4,096 characters in length.
